attributes.action: Get rid of the liberal policy in government and the country.
attributes.additional_details: The liberal policy of "do not blame them" and everyones a winner has led to rising crime culminiating in looting throughout England. London burns and what do we get? Fine words but no action even when its stopped it will still happen again because nothing happens when they get arrested or they get a scratch and get a payout for police brutality. It pays to be a criminal rather than a law abiding citizen.
